column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I don't love the layout of this place
column2: but I understand the need to cram in tables wherever they fit
column3: especially since big groups and birthdays love this place. There are so many rooms and corridors that you can get lost going to the bathroom. While I love being seated on the recently renovated patio
column4: I'm less of a fan of being seated I the basement.
